content.rendered:
Directed by Abhishek Sharma

Written by Chandra Prakash Dwivedi. Abhishek Sharma

Cast Akshay Kumar (Dr. Aryan Kulshrestha). Jacqueline Fernandez (Dr. Sandra Rebello). Nushrratt Bharuccha (Gayatri Kulshrestha). Nassar (Indrakant Varma). Satyadev Kancharana (Anjaneya Pushpakumara). Pravessh Rana (Bali). Jeniffer Piccinato (Dr. Gabrielle). Ramakant Dayma (Dr. Chandra). Neeraj Goswami (Udyan). Zachary Coffin (Prof. Andrew). Shweta Kawatra (Addl. Solicitor General). Atul Tiwari (Judge 1). Jayasri Rachakonda (Judge 2). Sudhir Gulyani (Judge 3). Girish Sharma (TV News Anchor). Pradeep Patwardhan (Minister M. K. Sathe). Bipin Nadkarni (Dr. Sinha). Balachandra Rai (PIL Lawyer). Anngad Maaholay (Kabir Kulshreshtha). Vikrant Koul (Chopper Pilot). Deepansha Dhingra (TV News Reporter). Varun Pande (Indian Reporter in Afghanistan). Darshan Pandya (Bilawal – Pakistani Archaeologist). Bhawana Rai (Tamiko – Japanese Archaeologist). Mohammad Ali (Habibullah – Afghan Governor). Jahangir Khan (Ahmed Khan – Afghan in Bamiyan). Sheila Gore (Kabir’s School Principal). Pallavi Ajay Patil (Kabir’s Teacher). Nitesh Sonawane (Music Teacher). Viren Thambidorai (Old Tamil Librarian). Meetali Parmar (Srilankan Bride). Paritosh Tiwari (Srilankan Groom). Charanjit Kaur (Gayatri’s Mother). Manish Sisodia (Gayatri’s Father). Inderpreet Singh (Mr. Chaddha – Varanasi Neighbour). Sunita Damani (Mrs. Chaddha – Varanasi Neighbour). Sunkara Lakshmi (Tamil Fisherwoman). Manoj Kumar Sharma (Temple Priest). Mahesh Sharma (Student discussing Ram Setu). Jay Thakkar (Student discussing Ram Setu). Amrut J.(Naughty School Kid). Nitin Khanna (Naughty Kid’s Father). Khushbu Patel (Naughty Kid’s Mother). Shoaib Shaikh (Guy with Ink #1). Pankay Yadav (Guy with Ink #2). Shruti Narayann (Srilankan Librarian (as Shruti N.)). Raveesh Nayak (Suspicious Man in Jaffna Library). Harun Raj (Srilankan TTE). Saadhika Syal (Junior Lawyer). Preetish Manas (Bali’s Henchman). Ashish Rajput (Srilankan Taxi Driver). Murtaza Ezzi (Bali’s Shooter). Karthik (Bali’s Shooter). Krishna Kumar (Bali’s Shooter). Subhasis Chakraborty (Leftist)

Languages Hindi

Producers Aruna Bhatia. Vicky Bhatia. Chandra Prakash Dwivedi. Mahaveer Jain. Smriti Jain. Ritwick Maheshwari. Vikram Malhotra. Gaurav Mishra. Shikhaa Sharma. Aashish Singh. Tushar Sood. A. Subaskaran

Production Abundantia Entertainment. Amazon Prime Video. Cape of Good Films
